document_data.mainbody:
Aedelthrang the Black was a cleric of Uthgar in the Red Tiger tribe of Uthgardt barbarians that lived in the Silver Marches during the mid-14 century DR. He was an important authority figure within the tribe, serving as their "spirit talker".
Although the tribe was officially led by Chieftain Thradulf Longfang, following the death of his uncle Adalwulf, Adelthrang acted as their true leader.
